cs.man.ac.uk.classifiers.standard

Class StandardAlgorithmTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.common.Base
      • cs.man.ac.uk.classifiers.BaseClassifier
        • cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers.WekaClassifier
          • cs.man.ac.uk.classifiers.standard.StandardAlgorithmTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_WekaTest

    public class StandardAlgorithmTester
extends WekaClassifier
implements I_WekaTest
    Wrapper class for WEKA classifiers. Contains methods which automatically evaluate classifier output.
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

      • testStatic

        public int[][] testStatic(java.lang.String testSet,
                          java.lang.String outputPath,
                          boolean recordMissclassifications)
        Description copied from interface: I_WekaTest
        Tests the classifier, but does not learn on the test examples (static data set equivalent).
        Specified by:
        testStatic in interface I_WekaTest
        Parameters:
        testSet - the path to the test set.
        outputPath - the path to write results to.
        recordMissclassifications - a flag that when true, tells the classifier to record all the mistakes made on data for which there are labels.
        Returns:
        confusion matrix describing binary classification outcomes.
